function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through touch-based technology, such as self-checkout counters","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread among consumers and retail staff","Mitigation":"Regular sanitation of self-checkout counters, contactless payment options, and installation of protective barriers","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV sanitation technology, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Consumers, retail staff, and anyone in close proximity to self-checkout counters","Owner":"Retailers, technology companies, and government health agencies"}]}
